properties.description: Contextmenu name that associates it with trigger component
properties.name: name

methods.description: Check if contextmenu is going to exceed window limits
methods.name: _exceedsWindow

methods.description: Relocate contextmenu correctly without exceed window limits
methods.name: _relocateContextmenu

params.description: Position X of mouse event click
params.name: posX

params.description: Position Y of mouse event click
params.name: posY

params.description: Side where contextmenu exceed window limits
params.name: exceedsObject

methods.description: Set close button for opening by click version for small devices
methods.name: _setResponsiveClose

methods.description: Set up declarative user contextmenu items
methods.name: _setupItems

methods.description: Set up span with name of app
methods.name: _setupSpan

methods.description: Update device options and set events
methods.name: _updateDeviceOptions

methods.description: Check if there is already a contextmenu open and close it
methods.name: _verifyOpenContextmenu

params.description: Stores the node of open contextmenu
params.name: openContextmenu

methods.description: Add new contextmenu node item programmatically
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Remove node item passed as parameter
methods.name: removeItem

methods.description: Replace old node item with a new one
methods.name: replaceItem

methods.description: Show contextmenu at position where clicked
methods.name: show

params.description: Position X of mouse event click
params.name: posX

params.description: Position Y of mouse event click
params.name: posY
